project 1.name: Spending App
project 1.desc: Responsive web page that displays an expense chart with dynamically sized bars. Allows for inputting and saving spending and balance data. Made entirely with vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript

project 2.name: Job Filtering Component
project 2.desc: Responsive web page that displays job listings with a filters them according to selected keywords. Made entirely with vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

project 3.name: Countdown Clock
project 3.desc: Responsive web page with animated countdown timer. Made with mostly vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript. GSAP and canvas-confetti were used for the animations.

project 4.name: Room Landing Page
project 4.desc: Responive landing page with a precise layout. Includes a mobile menu and image slideshow made from scratch. Made entirely with vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript

project 5.name: Rating Component
project 5.desc: Responsive web page for a rating component. Allows for giving ratings and diplaying an average rating based on localStorage data. Made entirely with vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript

project 6.name: Quote Generator
project 6.desc: Advice generator app that retrieves random advice from an API. Made entirely with vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript
